Class Value<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.values.Value<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValueInteger, ValueString

    public abstract class Value<K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Abstract Value contained in the Key-Value store
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade
